content: **crocheted bag in drops bomull-lin piece is work bottom up with popcorn pattern ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #villagestrollbag drops design pattern l-174 yarn group c or a + a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** piece measures approx width = 18 cm height = approx 24 cm **yarn** drops bomull-lin from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 150 g colour 11 beige **button** drops button no 811 1 piece **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 4 mm **crochet gauge** 17 double crochets in width and 20 row vertically on hook size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm 6 repetitions with a 2b = 10 cm in width note remember that crochet hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook size if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook size
